*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *20 sour }} '''Colbur''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Rabuta]], at least 1 [[Kasib]] and at least 1 [[Payapa]].
